entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 11:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

Temperature: -10.0°C

Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -11

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
